agile-project-management.pageDescription: For Scrum Masters and Product Owners responsible for maintaining streamlined processes and running virtual ceremonies, Draft embraces all Agile workflows with flexibility and simplicity.
agile-project-management.title: Draft for Agile Project Management

baseline.one: Plan and create unique products in fast-moving environments. Draft embraces all Agile workflows with flexibility, simplicity, and ease.
baseline.two: As a flexible yet structured visual support, Draft can embrace your whole Agile workflow.

story-mapping.title: Story Mapping
story-mapping.text: Create a big picture of the user experience by mapping product requirements visually along a clean and cohesive narrative flow.

scrum-board.title: Scrum Board
scrum-board.text: Add greater transparency, clarity, and flexibility to team task management.

program-board.title: Program Board
program-board.text: Coordinate cross-functional teams in real-time and get a bird’s eye view of dependencies to prevent bottlenecks.

retrospective.title: Retrospective
retrospective.text: Design your own retrospective exercises or use one of our templates to get started.

agile-project-management.features-bloc-title: Encourage communication and maximize transparency with these features

story-card.title: Story Cards
story-card.text: Manage projects visually by gathering critical information about user stories on useful digital cards.

jira-integration.title: Jira Integration
jira-integration.text: Streamline your team’s workflow in real-time with bi-directional syncing between Draft and Jira.

vote.title: Voting
vote.text: Improve team decision-making by making sticky-notes or story card voteable.

polling-booth-mode.title: Polling booth mode
polling-booth-mode.text: Allow team members to add ideas without them being visible to others.
